remarks: Strong (or "total") induction principle over the nonnegative integers. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-May-2014.)
statement:
nn0sinds.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
nn0sinds.2 $e |- ( x = N -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
nn0sinds.3 $e |- ( x e. NN0 -> ( A. y e. ( 0 ... ( x - 1 ) ) ps -> ph ) ) $.
nn0sinds $p |- ( N e. NN0 -> ch ) $.
$d N x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
$d x y $.
